description.english: Reach stage 4 without using a revive.

Reach stage 3 without using a revive.
Complete every stage in Lost Dunes in a single run.
Complete every stage in Magma Caverns in a single run.
Complete every stage in Rogue Isles in a single run.
Complete every stage in Alpine Abyss in a single run.
Play with 10 upgrades purchased from Yggdrassil.

Collect 25,000 dust in The Solus Station I.
Defeat 250 mini bosses in The Ore Refinery.
Defeat 1,000 Marines, Snipers, & Sentinels on Frosty Peaks.
Defeat 250 mini bosses in Port Poseidon.
Run over 5,000 Dominion enemies while driving around North District.

Defeat 20,000 enemies in Solus Station II.
Defeat a Boss with Camelot's Justice.
Level up an Arthur hero ability 5 times.

Level up an Athena hero ability 5 times.
Level up a Gilgamesh hero ability 5 times.
Defeat a Boss with Burn damage.

Collect 50 Salt fragments from defeating Lost Dunes Bosses.

Defeat 500 Enemies while in Vehile Form.
Complete a Stage in each Biome in a single run.
